description: Borrowed from French pasteuriser. From Louis Pasteur, the inventor of the process, + -ize.

verbs.description: pasteurize (third-person singular simple present pasteurizes, present participle pasteurizing, simple past and past participle pasteurized)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To heat food for the purpose of killing harmful organisms such as bacteria, viruses, protozoa, molds, and yeasts.
